headline: Brace yourself: Nvidia and AMD GPU prices may rise as top AIBs adjust costs
summary: A new report suggests GPU prices may soon climb as NVIDIA and AMD partners face rising DDR6 and DDR7 costs, leaving consumers to spot changes through retail listings. The post Brace yourself: Nvidia and AMD GPU prices may rise as top AIBs adjust costs appeared first on Digital Trends.

headline: Is Riot Platforms (RIOT) Quietly Recasting Its Bitcoin Identity With This AMD AI Data Center Deal?
summary: Earlier in January 2026, Riot Platforms announced a 10-year, 25MW data center lease and services agreement with AMD at its Rockdale, Texas site, with options that could significantly expand AMD’s access to AI and high-performance computing capacity. This deal marks a meaningful broadening of Riot’s business model as it seeks to pair its large power footprint with long-term AI infrastructure tenants, reducing reliance on Bitcoin mining alone. Next, we’ll examine how this AMD agreement...

headline: I Predicted TSMC Would Be a Must-Own Stock in 2025. I Still Think It's a Fantastic Buy in 2026

headline: MarketBeat Week in Review – 01/19 - 01/23
